entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
